title: Do sports scientsits know the hypothesis they are testing?
Welcome To My Blog
text: This blog website is currently under construction as I am busy finishing up my PhD thesis. This blog will feature content on a range of topics, including sports and exercise science research, methods and statistics, and metascience.

title: About
text: Soon I will be submitting my PhD thesis which focused on the replicability and reproducibility of sports and exercise science research. I am currently a Postdoctoral researcher at Eindhoven University of Technology, where I do meta-science and teach quantitative research methods in psychology. My current work involves working with Daniël Lakens and Lisa Debruine on Papercheck, an R package designed to assist researchers in preventing common errors, enforcing best research practices, and extracting data from published studies. In the upcoming academic year, I will be teaching quantitative research methods in psychology.
